page.title: 11WAKEFIELD DISTRICT COLLEGE
page.content: The college was established in 1981 to provide all the educational needs for young people aged 16 and over, and opportunities for continuous education for all people interested. This work is carried out on three main sites and eight annexes throughout the district. By this year 1985, the college had succeeded in obtaining the best ever examination results within the State educational provision in the Wakefield district, as well as the highest number of students obtaining places at University and Polytechnic. We have 2500 full time students and 4000 part time students, and as well as trying to prepare them for using the skills of tomorrow we encourage our students to work as teams so that skills and harmony are combined. K.RUDDIMAN
